property.name: PREVIEW_OFF
property.shortdesc: Normal view; displays guides and frame edges.

property.name: PREVIEW_TO_PAGE
property.shortdesc: Preview mode; displays the document as it will be printed &#40;hides guides and frame edges).

property.name: PREVIEW_TO_BLEED
property.shortdesc: Preview mode including the bleed area.

property.name: PREVIEW_TO_SLUG
property.shortdesc: Preview mode including the slug area.

property.name: PRESENTATION_PREVIEW
property.shortdesc: Preview mode with editing turned off. Mouse clicks and arrow keys will move to previous or next spread.
